articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: Notably, Ryan Pinder's years in public service included a year-long break to work at Deltec Bank, a Bahamanian firm with ties to FTX.
articles.title: Attorney General of The Bahamas Defends Its Crypto Savvy in Wake of FTX Crash

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Hardware wallets are a popular option for securing digital assets, and blockchain intelligence firms are also offering deals.
articles.title: Crypto Cyber Monday Deals for Your Shopping List

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The crypto community takes the search for the disgraced FTX founder into their own hands.
articles.title: Would-Be Crypto Sleuths Converge on Bahamas to Hunt for SBF

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: SBF went from crypto hero to zero in a few ruinous days. The contagion and reputational damage for the industry is brutal. Can we learn from it?
articles.title: 5 Lessons From the Stunning Implosion of SBF and FTX

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also, the Ethereum team wanted everyone to know that fees on the network may soon be reduced by as much as 100x.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Genesis in the Spotlight as FTX Shockwaves Subside

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Terry Duffy made the slip while speaking to Tucker Carlson on Fox News.
articles.title: CME Head Appears To Say He Bribed CTFC Official

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: As the FTX contagion continues, crypto marketers are scrambling to sell a more appealing vision of the industry—and reassure a wary public.
articles.title: Crypto Marketers Search for a New Sales Pitch After FTX Crisis

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The trader who exploited Mango Market failed to do the same on Aave. But he did prove a point, and left Aave with $1.6 million in bad debt.
articles.title: Aave Feeling the Squeeze Even After Failed Attempt by Mango Hacker

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: It looks like the worst may be over for now, though a CoinShares report suggests institutional players are lining up to short crypto.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin, Ethereum Stable—Has the Worst of the FTX Damage Passed?

articles.author: Kade Garrett
articles.description: The internet is slowly evolving into its third iteration — Web3. How will NFTs be incorporated into the Web3 paradigm?
articles.title: What Is Web3 and What Is Its Role in NFTs?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: State regulators are turning their attention to troubled crypto firm Genesis Global Capital for potential securities violations.
articles.title: Several US States Open Investigation Into Crypto Lender Genesis: Report

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: While the rest of the crypto market is sleepy from turkey, the original meme coin is on a rocket-ride today.
articles.title: Dogecoin Gets Double-Digit Black Friday Pump

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Binance today announced the release of its Proof of Reserve system, starting with Bitcoin at launch.
articles.title: Binance Launches Proof-of-Reserve System for Bitcoin, Ethereum 'Coming in The Near Future'

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto trading and lending firm Matrixport is reportedly seeking a new $100 million raise that will see its valuation jump to $1.5 billion.
articles.title: Matrixport Targets New $100M Funding Round at $1.5B Valuation

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Binance's decision comes amid extreme uncertainty for Serum over the past month as a result of its links to the now-bankrupt FTX and its founder.
articles.title: Binance Removes Trading Pairs for Solana-based Exchange Serum Token

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: With MetaMask and Uniswap revealing the extent to which they track their users, many in the community have pushed back. Are they right?
articles.title: Is It Wrong for DeFi Projects to Track Data?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Traditional blue chip stocks are reliably stable, they are unlikely to generate the same high returns as potentially riskier investments. The same holds true for so-called blue chip NFTs
articles.title: What Is a Blue Chip NFT?

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Turkey’s Financial Crimes Investigation Board has seized assets belonging to the local subsidiary of the FTX crypto exchange and its affiliates.
articles.title: Authorities in Turkey Seize FTX Founder Sam Bankman-Fried’s Assets

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum both rose several points on Thanksgiving day, as the bearish pressure of FTX's collapse appears to be waning.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Post Modest Thanksgiving Gains as Crypto Market Claws Back $12B

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Singapore's police received multiple reports between August and November that Holdnaut downplayed exposure to a "certain digital token."
articles.title: Singapore Police Probe Hodlnaut for ‘Possible Cheating and Fraud’

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: New updates to ConsenSys' API tool Infura have sparked controversy in the crypto community as it will begin collecting users’ IP addresses.
articles.title: Infura Collecting MetaMask Users' IP, Ethereum Addresses After Privacy Policy Update

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Binance chief Changpeng Zhao said the fund would initially have $1 billion to buy up distressed assets, but the figure could be increased.
articles.title: Binance Launches $1 Billion Raise for Crypto 'Recovery Fund', Could Buy FTX Assets

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: "Avengers: Endgame" directors the Russo brothers will produce a mini-series based on FTX's collapse, with "multiple Marvel actors" in talks to star.
articles.title: 'Avengers' Directors to Bring FTX Miniseries to Amazon

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Ryan Wyatt, CEO of Polygon Studios, discusses the recent wave of major Web2 brands building on the platform.
articles.title: Polygon’s ‘Secret Sauce’: Why Starbucks, Meta, and Reddit Chose the Ethereum Scaler

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: A panel of futurists sat down at Camp Decrypt to examine the role of storytelling in Web3 and NFTs.
articles.title: Storytelling Plus Technology Equals Freedom: Author Jason Primrose

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The golden-fur Ethereum NFT sold for 800 ETH, or about $927,000, even as wider Bored Ape Yacht Club prices trend downward.
articles.title: NFTs Are Dead? Even in Bear Market, a Bored Ape Sells for Nearly $1 Million

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Crypto followed U.S. stocks upward Wednesday on signs that the Fed may shift to smaller interest rate hikes.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Dogecoin Jump on Release of Fed Minutes

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: NFTs establish digital scarcity and unique, provable identifiers. They indicate which digital asset is the original—like a certified painting in a room full of duplicate prints.
articles.title: NFT Real-Life Use Cases

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Nikkei reported Wednesday that the Bank of Japan has started working on a CBDC with three megabanks.
articles.title: Japan Kicks Off Central Bank Digital Currency Experiment

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Launched today, the official marketplace offers lower trading fees than most NFT platforms, plus other Bored Ape-centric perks.
articles.title: How a Tiny Startup Beat Magic Eden and Rarible to Build ApeCoin’s NFT Marketplace

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Musk has sought to distance himself from the crypto founder since FTX’s catastrophic collapse this past month.
articles.title: Elon Musk Calls Report That SBF Invested $100M in Twitter ‘False’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Notable Chinese venture investor Bo Shen revealed he lost $42 million worth of crypto as a result of a theft from his personal wallet.
articles.title: Fenbushi Founder Bo Shen Loses $42M in Stablecoins, Bitcoin, Ethereum to Hackers

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Privacy coins like Monero and Zcash could soon be playing a much larger role in the multibillion-dollar world of cybercrime crypto transfers.
articles.title: Bitcoin Will Become ‘Less Important’ for Cybercrime Payments: Kaspersky

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: New York became the first state to instate a temporary moratorium on new fossil fuel-powered cryptocurrency mining operations.
articles.title: New York Signs Two-Year Crypto Mining Moratorium Into Law

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Despite the day’s recovery for leading cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dogecoin are still in the red over the week.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Muster Thanksgiving Rally as Markets Rebound

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The newly appointed majority whip did not mince words when blaming Sam Bankman-Fried and SEC Chair Gary Gensler for the industry's current state.
articles.title: FTX Collapse Is 'Not a Crypto Failure,' Says Minnesota Rep. Tom Emmer

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Following its groundbreaking Bitcoin Law, El Salvador is now seeking to court the broader cryptocurrency industry.
articles.title: Crypto Paradise? El Salvador Preps New Law To Pave Way for All Crypto

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Avraham Eisenberg, the crypto trader behind last month’s $100 million Mango Markets price manipulation maneuver, couldn’t do the same to Aave.
articles.title: Mango Market Hacker Loses Millions in Failed Aave Scheme

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Blockchain analytics firm Glassnode traced warning signs back to the Terra collapse.
articles.title: Onchain Data Shows FTX Collapse Was ‘Inevitable’: Report

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: CEO Devin Finzer speaks with Decrypt about royalties moves, the response from creators, and X2Y2 following its lead.
articles.title: Why OpenSea Is Sticking With NFT Creator Royalties

articles.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.
articles.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?

articles.description: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.
articles.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
